data.message: hey facebook. can you freaking remove this select audience thingy every time i want to post an update!?? also sharing from other post, it went straight as "only me" not friends for privacy. i always have to browse for my post to set the privacy again on that post i just shared. it's freaking annoying!!!! please...!

replies.message: Hey Fahrizal. You can use the Privacy Checkup to review and adjust your privacy settings to help make sure that you're sharing with who you want. To use the Privacy Checkup, follow these steps: http://bit.ly/2BlwdZA. -Tenaya
